scripts.dev:server: cd server && npm install && npm run start:dev
scripts.dev:netlify: cd frontend && npm install && netlify dev
scripts.dev:nest: cd server && npm install && npm run start:dev
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start:server: cd server && npm install && npm run start:prod
scripts.install:netlify: cd frontend && npm install && npm install -g netlify-cli
scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:server
